cultist_message: The eye gives you an intensely hateful glare.

name: blind eye

clockwork_desc: A smashed ocular warden covered in dents. Serviceable as a substitute for a belligerent eye.
cultist_message: The eye flickers at you with intense hate before falling dark.

name: lens gem
desc: A tiny pinkish gem. It catches the light oddly, almost glowing.
clockwork_desc: The gem from an interdiction lens. Serviceable as a substitute for a belligerent eye.
cultist_message: The gem turns black and cold for a moment before its normal glow returns.

name: geis capacitor
desc: A curiously cold brass doodad. It seems as though it really doesn't appreciate being held.
cultist_message: \Try not to lose your mind - I'll need it. Heh heh...\

name: mania motor antennae
desc: A pair of dented and bent antennae. They constantly emit a static hiss.
clockwork_desc: The antennae from a mania motor. Serviceable as a substitute for a geis capacitor.
cultist_message: Your head is filled with a burst of static.

name: fallen armor
desc: Lifeless chunks of armor. They're designed in a strange way and won't fit on you.
clockwork_desc: The armor from a former clockwork marauder. Serviceable as a substitute for a geis capacitor.
cultist_message: Red flame sputters from the mask's eye before winking out.

name: hierophant ansible
desc: Some sort of transmitter? It seems as though it's trying to say something.
cultist_message: \Gur obff fnlf vg'f abg ntnvafg gur ehyrf gb-xvyy lbh.\

name: obelisk prism
desc: A prism that occasionally glows brightly. It seems not-quite there.
clockwork_desc: The prism from a clockwork obelisk. Serviceable as a substitute for a hierophant ansible.
cultist_message: The prism flickers wildly in your hands before resuming its normal glow.

name: replicant alloy
desc: A seemingly strong but very malleable chunk of metal. It seems as though it wants to be molded into something greater.
cultist_message: The alloy takes on the appearance of a screaming face for a moment.

name: replication plate
desc: A flat, heavy disc of metal with a triangular formation on its surface.
clockwork_desc: The replication plate from a tinkerer's daemon. Serviceable as a substitute for replicant alloy.
cultist_message: The plate shudders in your hands, as though trying to get away.

name: smashed anima fragment
desc: Shattered chunks of metal. Damaged beyond repair and completely unusable.
clockwork_desc: The sad remains of an anima fragment. Serviceable as a substitute for replicant alloy.
cultist_message: The shards vibrate in your hands for a moment.

name: vanguard cogwheel
desc: A sturdy brass cog with a faintly glowing blue gem in its center.
cultist_message: \Pray to your god that we never meet.\

name: onyx prism

clockwork_desc: A broken prism from a mending motor. Serviceable as a substitute for a vanguard cogwheel.
cultist_message: The prism grows painfully hot in your hands.

name: ratvarian spear

Alert
desc: Something seems to have gone wrong with this alert, so report this bug please

desc: It's too hot! Flee to space or at least away from the flames. Standing on weeds will heal you.

desc: There's flammable plasma in the air. If it lights up, you'll be toast.

desc: Your queen has been killed, you will suffer movement penalties and loss of hivemind. A new queen cannot be made until you recover.

desc: You've fallen asleep. Wait a bit and you should wake up. Unless you don't, considering how helpless you are.

desc: You shouldn't be seeing this description unless you're very fast. If you're very fast, good job!

desc: You're freezing cold! Get somewhere warmer and take off any insulating clothing like a space suit.

desc: All that alcohol you've been drinking is impairing your speech, motor skills, and mental cognition. Make sure to act like it.

desc: An Area Power Controller is being hacked. When the process is \

desc: You're flaming hot! Get somewhere cooler and take off any insulating clothing like a fire suit.

desc: Some food would be good right about now.

desc: Unit has been remotely locked down. Usage of a Robotics Control Console like the one in the Research Director's \

desc: Mech integrity is low.

desc:
Produces a strong, smart blobbernaut from a factory blob for 40 resources.
The factory blob used will become fragile and unable to produce spores.

desc:
Produces a factory blob for 60 resources.
Factory blobs will produce spores every few seconds.

Produces a node blob for 50 resources.

desc:
Produces a resource blob for 40 resources.
Resource blobs will give you resources every few seconds.

var/list/idle_messages: list( sulkily glares around.,  lazily drifts from side to side.,  looks around for something to burn.,  slowly turns in circles.)

var/static/list/rage_messages: list(..., Disgusting., Die., Foul., Worthless., Mortal., Unfit., Weak., Fragile., Useless., Leave my sight!)

clockwork_desc: An efficient machine that can rapidly produce components at a small power cost. It will only function if outnumbered by servants at a rate to 5:1.

clockwork_desc: A dormant receptable that, when powered with a soul vessel, will become a weak construct with an inbuilt proselytizer.
spawn_message: s eyes blink open, glowing bright red.

clockwork_desc: A dormant receptable that, when powered with a soul vessel, will become a powerful construct.
spawn_message: whirs and rises from the ground on a flickering jet of reddish fire.

name: strange smoke

var/harvest_message_low: You pick a mushroom, but fail to collect many shavings from its cap.
var/harvest_message_med: You pick a mushroom, carefully collecting the shavings from its cap.
var/harvest_message_high: You harvest and collect shavings from several mushroom caps.

name: fruiting cacti
desc: Several prickly cacti, brimming with ripe fruit and covered in a thin layer of ash.
harvested_desc: A bunch of prickly cacti. You can see fruits slowly growing beneath the covering of ash.
harvest_message_high: You pick a pair of cactus fruit.

name: tall mushrooms
desc: Several mushrooms, the larger of which have a ring of conks at the midpoint of their stems.
harvested_desc: Several small mushrooms near the stumps of what likely were larger mushrooms.
harvest_message_low: You slice the cap off a mushroom.
harvest_message_med: You slice off a few conks from the larger mushrooms.
harvest_message_high: You slice off a number of caps and conks from these mushrooms.

name: leafy mushrooms
desc: A number of mushrooms, each of which surrounds a greenish sporangium with a number of leaf-like structures.
harvested_desc: A bunch of formerly-leafed mushrooms, with their sporangiums exposed. Scandalous?
harvest_message_low: You pluck a single, suitable leaf.
harvest_message_med: You pluck a number of leaves, leaving a few unsuitable ones.
harvest_message_high: You pluck quite a lot of suitable leaves.

name: numerous mushrooms
desc: A large number of mushrooms, some of which have long, fleshy stems. They're radiating light!
harvested_desc: A few tiny mushrooms around larger stumps. You can already see them growing back.
harvest_message_low: You pick and slice the cap off a mushroom, leaving the stem.
harvest_message_med: You pick and decapitate several mushrooms for their stems.
harvest_message_high: You acquire a number of stems from these mushrooms.

desc: Arf arf. Yap.

name: Ion Rifle
desc: A poster displaying an Ion Rifle.

name: Love Ian
desc: Ian is love, Ian is life.

name: Nanomichi Ad
desc: A poster advertising Nanomichi brand audio cassettes.

name: Nanotrasen Logo
desc: A poster depicting the Nanotrasen logo.

name: No ERP
desc: This poster reminds the crew that Eroticism, Rape and Pornography are banned on Nanotrasen stations.

name: Obey
desc: A poster instructing the viewer to obey authority.

name: PDA Ad
desc: A poster advertising the latest PDA from Nanotrasen suppliers.

name: Report Crimes
desc: A poster encouraging the swift reporting of crime or seditious behavior to station security.

name: Safety: Eye Protection
desc: A poster instructing the viewer to wear eye protection when dealing with chemicals, smoke, or bright lights.

name: Safety: Internals
desc: A poster instructing the viewer to wear internals in the rare environments where there is no oxygen or the air has been rendered toxic.

name: Safety: Report
desc: A poster instructing the viewer to report suspicious activity to the security force.

name: Science
desc: A poster depicting an atom.

name: Soft Cap Pop Art
desc: A poster reprint of some cheap pop art.

name: Space Cops.
desc: A poster advertising the television show Space Cops.

name: State Laws
desc: A poster instructing cyborgs to state their laws.

name: The Owl
desc: The Owl would do his best to protect the station. Will you?

name: 12 Gauge
desc: A poster boasting about the superiority of 12 gauge shotgun shells.

name: Ue No.
desc: This thing is all in Japanese.

name: Walk
desc: A poster instructing the viewer to walk instead of running.

name: Work For A Future
desc: A poster encouraging you to work for your future.

name: Carbon Dioxide
desc: This informational poster teaches the viewer what carbon dioxide is.

name: ripped poster
desc: You can't make out anything from the poster's original print. It's ruined.

name: HAZARDOUS RADIATION
desc: A warning sign alerting the user of potential radiation hazards.

name: \improper SCIENCE
desc: A sign labelling an area where research and science is performed.

name: \improper SECURE AREA
desc: A warning sign which reads 'SECURE AREA'.

name: \improper HARD VACUUM AHEAD
desc: A warning sign which reads 'HARD VACUUM AHEAD'.

name: DANGEROUS ALIEN LIFE
desc: A sign that warns would-be travellers of hostile alien life in the vicinity.

name: \improper XENOBIOLOGY
desc: A sign labelling an area as a place where xenobiological entities are researched.

name: sink
desc: A sink used for washing one's hands and face.

name: puddle
desc: A puddle used for washing one's hands and face.

name: space vines
desc: An extremely expansionistic species of vine.

name: strange tile
desc: A weird tile that beckons you towards it. Maybe it can help you get out of this mess...

name: cocoon
desc: Something wrapped in silky spider web

name: slimy cocoon
desc: Something is moving inside.

name: egg cluster
desc: They seem to pulse slightly with an inner life

name: spiderling
desc: It never stays still for long.

name: spirit board
desc: A wooden board with letters etched into it, used in seances.

name: Weight Machine
desc: Just looking at this thing makes you feel tired.

name: statue
desc: Placeholder. Yell at Firecage if you SOMEHOW see this.

name: statue of the chief medical officer
statue of the head of personnel
statue of the head of security
statue
desc: An incredibly lifelike marble carving.

name: statue of an assistant
desc: A cheap statue of sandstone for a greyshirt.

name: statue of a pure maiden
desc: An ancient marble statue. The subject is depicted with a floor-length braid and is wielding a toolbox. By Jove, it's easily the most gorgeous depiction of a woman you've ever seen. The artist must truly be a master of his craft. Shame about the broken arm, though.

name: snowman
desc: Several lumps of snow put together to form a snowman.

name: Statue of an engineer
desc: This statue has a sickening green colour.

name: statue of a nuclear fission explosive
desc: This is a grand statue of a Nuclear Explosive. It has a sickening green colour.

name: swarmer blockade
desc: A quickly assembled energy blockade. Will not retain its form if damaged enough, but disabler beams and swarmers pass right through.

name: swarmer trap
desc: A quickly assembled trap that electrifies living beings and overwhelms machine sensors. Will not retain its form if damaged enough.

name: table
desc: A square piece of metal standing on four metal legs. It can not move.

name: alien table
desc: Advanced flat surface technology at work!

name: glass table
desc: What did I say about leaning on the glass tables? Now you need surgery.

name: operating table
desc: Used for advanced medical procedures.

name: alien operating table
desc: Used for alien medical procedures. The surface is covered in tiny spines.

name: reinforced table
desc: A reinforced version of the four legged table, much harder to simply deconstruct.

name: brass table
desc: A solid, slightly beveled brass table.

name: wooden table
desc: Do not apply fire to this. Rumour says it burns easily.

name: fancy table
desc: A standard metal table frame covered with an amazingly fancy, patterned cloth.

name: gambling table
desc: A seedy table for seedy dealings in seedy places.

name: table frame
desc: Four metal legs with four framing rods for a table. You could easily pass through this.

name: alien table frame
desc: A sturdy table frame made from alien alloy.

name: brass table frame
desc: Four pieces of brass arranged in a square. It's slightly warm to the touch.

name: wooden table frame
desc: Four wooden legs with four framing wooden rods for a wooden table. You could easily pass through this.

name: tank dispenser
desc: A simple yet bulky storage device for gas tanks. Holds up to 10 oxygen tanks and 10 plasma tanks.

name: target stake
desc: A thin platform with negatively-magnetized wheels.

name: toilet
desc: The HT-451, a torque rotation-based, waste disposal unit for small matter. This one seems remarkably clean.

name: IT'S A TRAP
desc: stepping on me is a guaranteed bad day

name: frost trap
desc: A trap that will chill you to the bone. You'd better avoid it.

name: Spawn protection
desc: Stay outta the enemy spawn!

name: earth trap
desc: A trap that will summon a small earthquake, just for you. You'd better avoid it.

name: flame trap
desc: A trap that will set you ablaze. You'd better avoid it.

name: shock trap
desc: A trap that will shock and render you immobile. You'd better avoid it.

name: divine ward
desc: A divine barrier, It looks like you could destroy it with enough effort, or wait for it to dissipate...

name: crematorium tray
desc: Apply body before burning.

name: morgue tray
desc: Apply corpse before closing.

name: urinal
desc: The HU-452, an experimental urinal. Comes complete with experimental urinal cake.

name: Weight Machine
desc: Just looking at this thing makes you feel tired.

name: window
desc: A window.

name: reinforced window
desc: A window that is reinforced with metal rods.

name: brass window
desc: A paper-thin pane of translucent yet reinforced brass.

name: shuttle window
desc: A reinforced, air-locked pod window.

name: vehicle
desc: A basic vehicle, vroom

name: all-terrain vehicle
desc: An all-terrain vehicle built for traversing rough terrain with ease. One of the few old-earth technologies that are still relevant on most planet-bound outposts.

name: bicycle
desc: Keep away from electricity.

name: janicart (pimpin' ride)
desc: A brave janitor cyborg gave its life to produce such an amazing combination of speed and utility.

name: lava boat
desc: A boat used for traversing lava.

name: mysterious boat
desc: This boat moves where you will it, without the need for an oar.

name: scooter
desc: A fun way to get around.

name: skateboard
desc: An unfinished scooter which can only barely be called a skateboard. It's still rideable, but probably unsafe. Looks like you'll need to add a few rods to make handlebars.

name: secway
desc: A brave security cyborg gave its life to help you look like a complete tool.

name: BM Speedwagon
desc: Push it to the limit, walk along the razor's edge.
